author: Megha Mandavia
title: MeitY seeks ideas on IT Act revamp
description: Following MeitY’s ask, the Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade has written to industry bodies for feedback. Industry lobby group Nasscom, Confederation of Indian Industry, Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry, and Assocha…
content: Bengaluru: The government has started inter-departmental and industry consultations to revamp the Information Technology (IT) Act, 2000 to stay on top of the various technological advances in the social media, e-commerce, cybercrime and digital payments space… [+1664 chars]
